alert.note: Alert for Crawford; Northern Erie; Southern Erie (Pennsylvania) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued February 03 at 12:59PM EST by NWS Cleveland
info.description: ...An intense lake effect snow band will affect eastern Erie and northeastern Crawford Counties Until 230 PM EST.... At 1257 PM EST, radar indicated an intense lake effect snow band along a line extending from near Erie to near Union City, moving east at 5 mph. HAZARDS INCLUDE... Visibility rapidly dropping to a quarter of a mile... Snow rates up to 1 inch per hour under the heart of the snow band... Locations impacted include... Erie, Corry, Union City, Waterford, Wattsburg, Riceville, Northwest Harborcreek, Lincolnville, Canadohta Lake, Lawrence Park, Wesleyville, Mill Village, McKean, Spartansburg, Elgin, Northwest Harborcr and Avonia. Use extra caution if you must travel into or through this lake effect snow band. Rapid changes in visibility and potentially slick roads are likely to lead to accidents. Consider delaying travel until this snow band passes your location. &&
